p: In the Mediterranean climate, water stress during the summer is a crucial limiting factor for many plants. Our results suggest that G. bermejoi has a different ecological behavior to G. struthium subsp. struthium, the latter maintaining a relatively high occurrence density even under conditions of virtually no precipitation during summer. This behavior contrasts with that of G. bermejoi, where the occurrence density plummeted to 0 below values around 10 mm for the same variable (Bio 14).
